alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Fulton (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 6:48AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Fulton and northeastern Baxter Counties through 715 AM CDT... At 648 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gamaliel Landing, or 8 miles northeast of Mountain Home, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mountain Home... Salem in Fulton County... Viola... Flint Springs... Ott... Gamaliel Landing... Fawn Park... Sturkie... Moko... Vidette... Clarkridge... Gamaliel... Robinson Point Landing... Henderson... Camp... Gepp... Norfork Lake... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
